actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The harpy makes two Claw or Screech attacks. If both Screech attacks hit one Giant or Humanoid, the target has disadvantage on the next save it makes against the harpy's Luring Song before the start of the harpy's next turn.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 8 (2d4+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Screech
actions.desc: _Ranged Spell Attack:_ +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 8 (2d6+1) thunder damage.

special_abilities.name: Monstrosity Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The harpy is resistant to exhaustion and to the frightened condition.
